bibl.title: The Date of the Dendur Foundation Inscription Reconsidered.
Bulletin of the American Society of Papyrologists

bibl.note: Reading a day date (27) rather than an indiction (7) in the Dendur foundation inscription (FHN 3.330) removes the basis for dating it more precisely within the period ca. 536-569. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Grzegorg Ochała, The Date of the Dendur Foundation Inscription Reconsidered.

Reading a day date (27) rather than an indiction (7) in the Dendur foundation inscription (FHN 3.330) removes the basis for dating it more precisely within the period ca. 536-569. - Avec résumé en anglais.
